title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.1 - Track straightaway
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.1 - Track straightaway

State Regulations

Every track licensed by the commission shall have a
straightaway of at least 440 yards in length, with a minimum width as may be
fixed by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4207.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
